name: One Left (chavalo, Hugo Moreira)
description:
Description:

One Left is a 2D Local PvP Shooter game. You must kill your opponent using only one arrow per life. Avoid all the traps and use them to your advantage.

Keep in mind this was a 48 hours jam game and so, it still isn't perfect!

We may resume the development in the future, but no plans for now.

Have fun!

One Left made by:

  • Hugo Moreira (Developer)
  • Miguel Carriço (Developer & 2D Artist)
  • Pedro Ferreira (2D Artist)
  • Tiago Maia (Developer)
  • Xavier Cravo (2D Artist)
